title: Increase fetch size to get data faster
sql:
set arraysize 10
select * from orders;

100,000 rows selected. 
Elapsed: 00:02:39.412

set arraysize 100
select * from orders;

100,000 rows selected. 
Elapsed: 00:00:16.303

set arraysize 1000
select * from orders;

100,000 rows selected. 
Elapsed: 00:00:01.874

explanations.text:
Fetch size = 10 rows
Time ~ 2 min 40s to get 100,000 rows

Fetch size = 1,000 rows
Get all 100k rows in under 2s 
~ 80x faster!
